title: About Me
paragraphs: I’m a passionate full stack web developer who enjoys building meaningful digital experiences. My journey into technology began with curiosity and has evolved into a strong foundation in modern web technologies and system design.

I believe great products are created at the intersection of logic and creativity. With a background in Computer Engineering and a strong artistic inclination, I focus on crafting solutions that are both functional and visually refined.

I continuously explore new technologies, refine my skills, and prioritize writing clean, scalable code. From intuitive user interfaces to robust backend systems, I approach each project with precision and purpose.
Beyond development, art and visual creativity influence how I think about design and user experience — blending structure with expression to create thoughtful digital products.
